column2: Salter Electronic Baby Toddler Scale Weighing Scale
column14: Salter Electronic Baby Toddler Scale Weighing Scale: Flipkart.com
column17:
Salter Electronic Baby Toddler Scale Weighing Scale Price: Rs.4930

Integrated growth chart that keeps a precise memory of the progress of your child?s height and weight without having to manually write it down. Built-in 1. 2 inch digital LCD screen is easy to understand. It gives weight increments on a scale from 0. 5 ounces to as much as 60 pounds. When your baby is old enough to stand you can remove the weight tray and have them stand on the separate foot platform. Protected by a 5 year limited warranty to ensure it will properly work for much time to come. Very affordable option that?s priced to fit the budget of most families. It?s not very expensive and even doubles as a pet scale.
